sentences.sContent: In ‘the open door ’, ‘open ’ is an adjective qualifying ‘door ’.
sentences.sCn: 在the open door中，open是修饰door的形容词。

sentences.sContent: ...Marketers must qualify their claims on the product packaging and limit them to a specific benefit...
...We have to find a way to qualify more people and not put ourselves at risk...
...low rates are irrelevant because they no longer qualify for mortgages...
...might not qualify as systematic or fair...

synos.tran: 限制；使具有资格；证明…合格

words.tran: 资格；条件；限制；赋予资格
限定词，[语] 限定语；取得资格的人；修饰语
限制（qualify的过去分词）；描述；授权予

trans.tranOther: to describe another word in a particular way
